H0.text: who sings good night on the beatles white album. John Lennon

H1.text: who sings good night on the beatles white album. Paul McCartney

H2.text: who sings good night on the beatles white album. George Harrison

H3.text: who sings good night on the beatles white album. Ringo Starr

A4.text: the early takes featured just Lennon on acoustic guitar and Starr singing.

A5.text: Lennon wrote 'Good Night' as a lullaby for his son Julian, and wanted Starr to sing it.
